name: UKey Pay
author: Team UKey

sections.description:
UKey: The open micropayments infrastructure

UKey enables cashless monetization of low-priced digital assets like your WP content. Tap into a new revenue stream and start selling your creative content for 5 cents or more!
sections.installation:
Starting with UKey consists of just two steps: installing and setting up the plugin.

Install UKey from WordPress plugin explorer

  1. Visit the plugins page within your dashboard and select “Add New”
  2. Search for “UKey” or “UKey Pay”
  3. Select and activate UKey from the search result
  4. Go to “UKey” menu and enter your Client ID; Retrieve the Client ID from UKey merchant dashboard

Install UKey manually

  1. Upload the “ukey” folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the UKey plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “UKey” menu and enter your Client ID; Retrieve the Client ID from UKey merchant dashboard
sections.faq:
How do I manage pricing for my posts/content

Login to your UKey merchant dashboard and go to “Assets” menu to manage pricing.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First release of UKey
  • Enables core paywall for collection of micropayments typically under a dollar.
  • US only release
